original_text: Behold, I will take away the posterity of Baasha, and the posterity of his house; and will make thy house like the house of Jeroboam the son of Nebat.
korean_text: 내가 너 바아사와 네 집을 쓸어버려 네 집이 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 집 같이 되게 하리니

sentences.original_text: I will take away the posterity of Baasha,
and the posterity of his house;
and will make thy house like the house of Jeroboam the son of Nebat.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 집을 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 집처럼 만들리라.
